ref: 8969 prāsa m. ʻ throwing ʼ Br., ʻ barbed missile ʼ MBh. [√as2]
Pa. pāsa -- m. ʻ a throw, spear ʼ;
K. prās m. ʻ customary return of a certain portion of gift sent by bride's father to husband's family on certain festive occasions, the portion so returned ʼ;
N. pāso ʻ anything unwanted that is left or deposited ʼ;
A. pah ʻ weapon, arrow ʼ. -- See pāśa -- 1.
